file.name: statements.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Boost statements
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8094
paths:
  '/accounts/{accountId}/meters':
    get:
      summary: Get Meters, associated with an account, and its service start and end dates (SSD...SED)
      parameters:
        - { $ref: '#/components/parameters/accountId' }
      responses:
        'default': { $ref: '#/components/responses/HttpErrorResponse' }
        '200':
          description: An list of meters for an account
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: { $ref: 'statements-files/account-meter.yaml#/AccountMeter' }

components:
  responses:
    HttpErrorResponse:
      description: Error Response
      content:
        application/json:
          schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/HttpError' }

  parameters:
    accountId:
      name: accountId
      in: path
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountId'
      required: true

  schemas:
    AccountId:
      type: string
      pattern: '\\d+'
    HttpError:
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/accounts/{accountId}/meters": at 1:554: get: at 1:561: responses: 200: at 1:641: content: application/json: at 1:672: schema: at 1:682: parse schema: item: at 1:691: parse schema: resolve "statements-files/account-meter.yaml#/AccountMeter": external "statements-files/account-meter.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
